Welcome to Project 3’s documentation!¶

class scripts.NN.NeuralNetwork(input_layer_size, hidden_layer_size, output_layer_size, seed=0)¶

Bases: object

Represents a neural network containing an input layer, a hidden layer, and an output layer.

seed¶

Seed for random number generation. Used for reproducibility.

Type

int

input_layer¶

The input layer of the network, where each element represents a node in the layer.

Type

np.array of ints

hidden_layer¶

The hidden layer of the network, where each element represents a node in the layer.

Type

np.array of ints

output_layer¶

The output layer of the network, where each element represents a node in the layer.

Type

np.array of ints

weights1¶

Weights between the input layer and the hidden layer.

Type

np.array of floats

weights2¶

Weights between the hidden layer and the output layer.

Type

np.array of floats

biases1¶

Biases between the input layer and the hidden layer.

Type

np.array of floats

biases2¶

Biases between the hidden layer and the output layer.

Type

np.array of floats

train(input_values, output_values, learning_rate=0.1, num_epochs=10)¶

Trains the NeuralNetwork using data with input data and corresponding output data.

Parameters

  • input_values (np.array of ints) – Values for input data.

  • output_values (np.array of ints) – Values for output data.

  • learning_rate (float) – Learning rate for training. Optional. Default is 0.1.

  • num_epochs (int) – Number of epochs for training. Optional. Default is 10.

Returns

epoch_losses – Average loss per epoch during training.

Return type

np.array of floats
